slideInfo.hText: Write a sentence that uses the rhetorical device of personification.
slideInfo.correctText:
ANSWER
Any sentence that gives inanimate objects human characteristics is acceptable.
SAMPLES OF PERSONIFICATION
The alarm clock, fearing it had been overlooked, shuttled to the end of the nightstand and bleated like a lost sheep.
Fear's icy fingers tapped at my shoulder, but courage crawled unexpectedly into my pocket.
